summary:
Added mipmaps for performance.
Improved Smoothness of the rocks slightly.
Re-textured - Light and Dark Version
descriptionHtml:
============
Description:
============
Firstly, this isn\'t anything special or amazing. I spent a lot of time trying different variations of smoothness and colouring and I like the results. I uploaded them for the community to enjoy them as I do:
If you don\'t like them - move along, I don\'t need to hear about it.
If you have some constructive criticism or Ideas - I would love to hear them.
If you like these rocks - please endorse.
I enjoy reading comments.

Added mipmaps for performance. Both the 1024 x 1024 and the 2048 x 2048 version have mipmaps and there is very little difference between them visually. The only time a difference will be noticeable is with rocks that stretch the textures a lot.

Improved Smoothness of the rocks slightly. The improved smoothness helps prevent pixelation on the rocks that stretch the textures. Again this will be more noticeable in the 2048 x 2048 version.

Re-textured - Light and Dark Version. Adds a nice colour variation to the rocks.
Screen shots show the difference quite well:

============
Credits:
============

Bethesda for the original textures.

============
Legal:
============

I don\'t like rules, but, I do like recognition for my work. 
So I don\'t care what anyone does with these files as long as they give me credit and attach a link to this page.

That being said, these cannot be converted to work on other games, due to the original files being created by Bethesda.
author: Roborabbit
